feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. High 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
